summary: Most core flow is implemented: 4 TanStack Router routes with Page1â†’Page2â†’Page3â†’Page4 navigation, Page1 â€œNoâ€ cycling behavior, celebration/kiss overlays, auto-advance from Page3 to Page4, and a cohesive baby-pink romantic layout. No backend work is required for this request; a backend actor file is added anyway.
